MS.S: A PowerShell module for handling color and cursor positioning via ANSI escape sequences

2.4.0: Switch to IPSMetadata serialization_x000D__x000A_ - Also add some cast constructors_x000D__x000A_ - Also add pipeline parameterSets for Get-Complement and Get-Cradient_x000D__x000A_ - Also minimize the whitespace when outputting color formatted_x000D__x000A_ - Also enabled emoji and nerdfont entities by default_x000D__x000A_ 2.3.1: Fix index problem decoding entities_x000D__x000A_ 2.3.0: Add emoji support_x000D__x000A_ - Also add nerdfont support_x000D__x000A_ 2.2.0: Add static methods for speed optimization_x000D__x000A_ 2.1.0: Hyperlinks_x000D__x000A_ - Added New-Hyperlink (alias URL) now that Windows Terminal supports them._x000D__x000A_ Note that Windows Console (conhost) _does not_ support hyperlinks, and any terminal which does not will ignore them._x000D__x000A_ For compatibility, always use the Uri as the text (i.e. do not pass the object parameter)._x000D__x000A_ - Added -PersistentColor option to reset the Foreground and Background for each object output when outputting arrays._x000D__x000A_ 2.0.0: Breaking change for the library:_x000D__x000A_ - Merge the "Colormine" namespace into PoshCode.Pansies_x000D__x000A_ Originally, this was a 3rd party MIT licensed library by @THEJoeZack._x000D__x000A_ He pulled his repo, so I am now just integrating it into Pansies_x000D__x000A_ - Expose Complement and Gradient in the C# library for others to use_x000D__x000A_ - Add GetComplement() method to RgbColor_x000D__x000A_ - Add PoshCode.Pansies.Gradient class with GetGradient static method_x000D__x000A_ - Add Get-Complement and Get-Gradient wrappers in module assembly_x000D__x000A_ 1.3.0: The color provider release_x000D__x000A_ - Add a RgbColor PSProvider that can convert colors to their escape sequences_x000D__x000A_ - Add Fg: drive and Bg: drive so you can "$Fg:Red$Bg:Blue$YourMessage"_x000D__x000A_ - Add support for x11 color names to make the drives more useful_x000D__x000A_ 1.2.2: Use full namespace + class name for RgbColor_x000D__x000A_ 1.2.1: Fix cmdlet export so New-Text and Write-Host show back up_x000D__x000A_ Make EXTERNALHELP work for functions_x000D__x000A_ Provide help for Get-Complement_x000D__x000A_ 1.2.0: Better support for using ConsoleColors_x000D__x000A_ Added Get-Complement to calculate the HSL complement or contrasting colors_x000D__x000A_ Fixed ConsolePalette so it reads the current console colors when possible_x000D__x000A_ 1.1.0: Support for serialization by the Configuration module_x000D__x000A_ Fix output of "bright" color object in ConEmu (workaround ConEmu bug)_x000D__x000A_ 1.0.0: Pre-release version with support for RGB colors
A PowerShell module for handling color and cursor positioning via ANSI escape sequences

2.4.0: Switch to IPSMetadata serialization_x000D__x000A_ - Also add some cast constructors_x000D__x000A_ - Also add pipeline parameterSets for Get-Complement and Get-Cradient_x000D__x000A_ - Also minimize the whitespace when outputting color formatted_x000D__x000A_ - Also enabled emoji and nerdfont entities by default_x000D__x000A_ 2.3.1: Fix index problem decoding entities_x000D__x000A_ 2.3.0: Add emoji support_x000D__x000A_ - Also add nerdfont support_x000D__x000A_ 2.2.0: Add static methods for speed optimization_x000D__x000A_ 2.1.0: Hyperlinks_x000D__x000A_ - Added New-Hyperlink (alias URL) now that Windows Terminal supports them._x000D__x000A_ Note that Windows Console (conhost) _does not_ support hyperlinks, and any terminal which does not will ignore them._x000D__x000A_ For compatibility, always use the Uri as the text (i.e. do not pass the object parameter)._x000D__x000A_ - Added -PersistentColor option to reset the Foreground and Background for each object output when outputting arrays._x000D__x000A_ 2.0.0: Breaking change for the library:_x000D__x000A_ - Merge the "Colormine" namespace into PoshCode.Pansies_x000D__x000A_ Originally, this was a 3rd party MIT licensed library by @THEJoeZack._x000D__x000A_ He pulled his repo, so I am now just integrating it into Pansies_x000D__x000A_ - Expose Complement and Gradient in the C# library for others to use_x000D__x000A_ - Add GetComplement() method to RgbColor_x000D__x000A_ - Add PoshCode.Pansies.Gradient class with GetGradient static method_x000D__x000A_ - Add Get-Complement and Get-Gradient wrappers in module assembly_x000D__x000A_ 1.3.0: The color provider release_x000D__x000A_ - Add a RgbColor PSProvider that can convert colors to their escape sequences_x000D__x000A_ - Add Fg: drive and Bg: drive so you can "$Fg:Red$Bg:Blue$YourMessage"_x000D__x000A_ - Add support for x11 color names to make the drives more useful_x000D__x000A_ 1.2.2: Use full namespace + class name for RgbColor_x000D__x000A_ 1.2.1: Fix cmdlet export so New-Text and Write-Host show back up_x000D__x000A_ Make EXTERNALHELP work for functions_x000D__x000A_ Provide help for Get-Complement_x000D__x000A_ 1.2.0: Better support for using ConsoleColors_x000D__x000A_ Added Get-Complement to calculate the HSL complement or contrasting colors_x000D__x000A_ Fixed ConsolePalette so it reads the current console colors when possible_x000D__x000A_ 1.1.0: Support for serialization by the Configuration module_x000D__x000A_ Fix output of "bright" color object in ConEmu (workaround ConEmu bug)_x000D__x000A_ 1.0.0: Pre-release version with support for RGB colors
